I

IncrementsMoveController - Class in org.klotski.controller
IncrementsMoveController is a controller class that is used to increment or decrement the number of moves.
It dialogues with Window, Board, BoardImp, GameSaver, HighScoreUpdater
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
IncrementsMoveController(Window, HighScoreUpdater) - Constructor for class org.klotski.controller.IncrementsMoveController
This constructor saved data from Window and HighScoreUpdater
incrementsMoveCounter(int, int) - Method in class org.klotski.controller.IncrementsMoveController
Function called when increments the number of moves.
It is preferable to call this function inline, for example:
incrementsMovesCounter(int, int) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Method called to upDate the number of the moves and call the right Controller, also to save the move
info() - Method in class org.klotski.controller.InfoController
Function to display info about the game and the authors.
It is preferable to call this function inline, for example:
InfoController - Class in org.klotski.controller
InfoController is a controller class that is used to display info about the game.
It dialogues with Window
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
InfoController(Window) - Constructor for class org.klotski.controller.InfoController
This constructor saved data from Window and HighScoreUpdater
isExiting() - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
Obtain boolean value exiting if the window is closing.
isFirst() - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
Obtain boolean value first if it's the first time it opens.
LoginPage.reactivate() is the only function that changes the value to false
isInside(String) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.HighScoreUpdater
Check if a user is inside the map
